Package ch.bt.emm.volumeHiding

Class VolumeHidingEMMOptimised

java.lang.Object
ch.bt.emm.volumeHiding.VolumeHidingEMM
ch.bt.emm.volumeHiding.VolumeHidingEMMOptimised
All Implemented Interfaces:
EMM
public class VolumeHidingEMMOptimised extends VolumeHidingEMM
This class implements the Optimised Volume Hiding SSE scheme from Patel et al.
Author:
Janet Greutmann

  • Method Details

    • trapdoor

      public SearchToken trapdoor(Label searchLabel) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Specified by:
      trapdoor in interface EMM
      Overrides:
      trapdoor in class VolumeHidingEMM
      Parameters:
      searchLabel - the search label in plaintext
      Returns:
      a search token that enables access to the entries in the encrypted index that correspond to the search label. The search token is generated using DPRFs and thus can be extended which reduces the communication overhead.
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException

    • search

      public Set<Ciphertext> search(SearchToken searchToken, EncryptedIndex encryptedIndex) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException
      Specified by:
      search in interface EMM
      Overrides:
      search in class VolumeHidingEMM
      Parameters:
      searchToken - the search token prefix that has been generated with trapdoor
      encryptedIndex - the encrypted index
      Returns:
      the set of ciphertexts that correspond to the labels encrypted in the extended token
      Throws:
      GeneralSecurityException
      IOException
